p: Statistical differences of samples, compared to untreated control cells, were assessed by a one-way ANOVA with the Tukeyâ€™s post-hoc multiple comparison test (GraphPad Prism Version 5, GraphPad Software, San Diego, CA, USA). p < 0.05 (*), p < 0.01 (**) and p < 0.001 (***) were taken as significant.
